mapper.select: SELECT slenterprise.EP_NAME as suppName, slseller.SL_CODE as suppCode FROM sl_seller slseller, sl_enterprise slenterprise WHERE slseller.EP_ID = slenterprise.EP_ID AND slseller.SL_ACCOUNT=#{slAccount}

SELECT dsproductlot.half_period as halfPeriod, mdlogisticsarea.lgcs_area_name as lgcsName, dsproductlot.classes_code as classesCode, dsproductlot.breed_code as breedCode, dsproductlot.machining_code as machiningCode, dsproductlot.feature_code as featureCode, dsproductlot.weight_code as weightCode, dsproductlot.grade_code as gradeCode, dsproductlot.manu_date as manuDate, dsproductlot.shelf_life as shelfLife, dsproductlot.stor_condition as storCondition, dsproductlot.food_manu_licen as foodManuLicen, dsproductlot.client as client, dsproductlot.un_client as unClient, dsproductlot.client_addr as clientAddr, dsproductlot.un_client_addr as unClientAddr, dsproductlot.client_phone as clientPhone, dsproductlot.un_client_phone as unClientPhone, dsproductlot.manu_origin as manuOrigin, dsproductlot.sum_new_act_num as sumNewActNum, dsproductlot.brand_logo as brandLogo, dsproductlot.pro_lot_num as proLotNum, FROM ds_product_lot dsproductlot left JOIN md_logistics_area mdlogisticsarea ON dsproductlot.lgcs_code=mdlogisticsarea.lgcs_area_code WHERE dsproductlot.supp_code = #{suppCode}
mapper.sql: DS.HALF_PERIOD AS halfPeriod, LOG.LGCS_AREA_NAME AS lgcsName, DS.PRO_LOT_NUM AS proLotNum
FROM ds_product_lot AS DS LEFT JOIN md_logistics_area AS LOG ON DS.LGCS_CODE = LOG.LGCS_AREA_CODE
